sentences.sContent: Eventually it all balances out and most people adjust to how their "new" body moves and works.
sentences.sCn: 不过最终，这一切都会达到平衡，多数人都适应‘新’身体的行动和运转方式。

sentences.sContent: What we’re seeing, they insist, is the dawning of a new life stage — a stage that all of us need to adjust to.
sentences.sCn: 他们坚持认为我们所见的是一个新生命阶段的开始——我们所有人都需要调整以适应这个阶段。
